data.message: Would someone PLEASE reply to my message? My husband's fb account is messed up and no one has contacted us to help.

replies.message: Hi Ann. If something's not working on Facebook, or you think there's a bug, you can report it to us. Just click the blue arrow in the top-right corner of a Facebook page, select Report a Problem, and follow the on-screen instructions. -Ryan

Tried that, Ryan. Haven't heard a word. 
My husband can barely see a thing on his screen - it's gobbledy gook - so not sure he can find the arrow. 
I reported and sent a screen shot last week and have had no reply. Yours is the first.

Ryan, our concern is that his account might've been hacked. But he can't get to a page where he can change his password if he can't read it. This isn't merely an inconvenience here - it could be a privacy problem. What do I do next????
I reported it again, just now, but don't expect any help from them either. Very frustrating. Please help.

Hi Ann. Rest assured our team is reviewing all reports and we appreciate your patience. In the meantime, you may be able to track the status of your report in the Support Dashboard: http://on.fb.me/1oMSTZa  - Elissa
If your Facebook account is temporarily unavailable should people still be able to see your wall?
Ok would be contract Ann Cornelison's husband!
